DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study look whether Advair® SYMBICORT® different effect airway constriction mean methacholine challenge testing .
DOC.criteria: 20 subject male female 1865 year age physician diagnose asthma Diagnosis asthma > 12 month Currently 2 puff SABA bid . Baseline percent FEV1 great 60 % less equal 100 % 12 % reversibility previous 12 month 12 % reversibility Screening Visit Positive MTC ( ≤ 8mg/ml ) end 2 week RunIn Currently symptomatic ACT score less 19 end run ICS ≥ 200 ≤ 400 ug/day Nonsmoker exsmoker < 10 pk year stop > 1 year ago Asthma exacerbation , significant airflow obstruction , respiratory infection Visits 0 2 . Patients fail screen one event may rescreened ( least 4 week recovery event ) . Preexisting lung disease asthma , include active infection Clinically significant medical disease uncontrolled despite treatment likely opinion investigator require change therapy study Noncompliance inability participate assessment . Current smoker former smoker lifetime smoke history ≥ 10 packyears . A current smoker define someone smoke one cigarette per day ( marijuana pipe cigar ) > /= 30 day within 24 month prior Visit 1 . Any individual smoke ( cigarette , marijuana , pipe , cigar ) occasionally , even < 30 day 24 month Prior Visit 1 , must agree abstain smoking time consent completion . History substance abuse may impair risk patient 's full participation study , judgment investigator . Participation another interventional clinical trial ( include trial approve drug interventional study include medication ) within 30 day 5 halflives investigational agent , whichever longer . Women positive urine pregnancy test .
